title: Mathematics Instructional Practice Competency Enhancement Program for Rural School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics pedagogy and understanding of rural educational environments
context.additional_context: Simulation environment reflecting real classroom situations of rural school teachers, incorporating smartphone-based VR content.

learning_goals: Learners can design math lessons suitable for rural environments by applying four or more improvisational teaching methods.
Learners develop practical skills to adjust instructional strategies within 24 hours by analyzing formative assessment data.
Learners can create personalized math instruction plans reflecting individual learning characteristics with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
